snippet.title: CITY OF MURALS (aka The Come Up) TRAILER 2022
snippet.description:
City of Murals is a cute and gross, action-platformer, rogue-lite.  It uses many metroidvania elements, has multiple movement abilities, violent and non-violent game mechanics, and every time you die you level up.

Steam Wishlist here:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1763260/City_of_Murals/?curator_clanid=4777282&utm_source=SteamDB

Itch.io page:
https://brotherly.itch.io/the-come-up

Mailing List:
https://robertnally.us15.list-manage.com/subscribe?u=f58aa6d8d989094e7692f8172&id=dfa798c12f

Follow Development:
https://twitter.com/PlayForPhilly
